Volunteer Coordinator: Peter Kaulfuss, Recruitment Coordinator; Phone: 1.604.685.4049 ext 221; Email: volunteer@canucksautism.ca
Service Details: - Provides year-round sports and recreation programs for individuals and families living with autism, while increasing awareness and providing training in communities across British Columbia- Kelowna programs include weekly multisport (soccer and basketball), swim and skate programs, summer multisport and bike day camps, and single-day family events.
How to Apply: Please visit the website if you are interested in learning about how to get started with the Canucks Autism Network.
Cost: Membership - annual fee of $25 per individual with Autism ; To access CAN programs, families must complete an online membership application that includes an annual fee of $25 per individual with autism. Once registered, members, families and individuals can participate in programs at subsidized rates thanks to the generous support of our donors and sponsors.
